attributes.action: Let dentists get back to work.
attributes.additional_details: Because the public’s dental health is deteriorating and they are desperate for dental care.
attributes.background: To provide dentists with PPE and allow them to see patients. Initially with no aerosol producing procedures until new guidelines on how to carry out such procedures safely are available.

rejection.details:
Dentists are scheduled to begin operating again from 8 June in England.  You can read more here:

https://www.england.nhs.uk/coronavirus/wp-content/uploads/sites/52/2020/03/Urgent-dental-care-letter-28-May.pdf
